original_title: Je meurs de soif, j'étouffe, je ne puis crier...
overview: "This is the story of a search, that of a woman in pursuit of her own identity. This woman, Marie-Noëlle Kauffmann, ventures into the world of representation, meets four characters who, each in their own way, give her a key to cross the five sequences/initiations of the film which are all benchmarks that she must absolutely cross to have an answer to the question: Can cinema help find a lost balance?" -Gerard Courant
title: Je meurs de soif, j'étouffe, je ne puis crier...
